alert.note: Alert for Treasure; Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 2:27PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam has been reported along the Big Horn River near Kingley Road and Highway 47. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Montana, including the following counties, in south central Montana, Big Horn and Yellowstone. In southeast Montana, Treasure. * WHEN...Until 215 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to the ice jam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 218 PM MST, Emergency management reported an ice jam near the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hardin, St. Xavier and Crow Indian Reservation. - Structures may be threatened in addition to flooding over nearby roads. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
